Waters of a Lower Register by Allison Janae Hamilton
Waters of a Lower Register by Allison Janae Hamilton

Waters of a Lower Register, by Allison Janae Hamilton, was a 5 channel film installation at Pier 3 of Brooklyn Bridge Park commissioned by Creative Art. The installation juxtaposes the environment of New York with the images of North Florida to evoke the threat of rising sea levels and disease (including COVID-19) spread through urban life. The website contains a biography of the artist, videos of the work, and an interview with the artist.
